posts.title: The Ancient Tribal Art of Vegan Hamster Gazing
posts.body: Fortunately for this vegan hamster gazer, most hamsters are likely vegan. This provides a lot of gazing material and makes life for vegan hamster gazers a little bit easier. I do have to question whether or not this is an 'ancient tribal art'. Regardless, it is ambitious.

posts.title: Stone Wall Stolen
posts.body: I'm as shocked as you are. Whoever these theives are, they should be commended for such a brazen act of theivery, yet criticized for their stupidity, because you can't get meth money for a stone wall.
